attributes.action: Call for an independent inquiry into the grooming Gangs scandals
attributes.additional_details: If Parliament is really democratic, then take self preservation out of the question and invite an inquiry to judge past actions.
attributes.background: I want to force the Government into a full inquiry. This is an enormous scandal that has gone on for years by successive governments. There is no reason not to have an inquiry, unless you have something to hide.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
